name: hoodik
description: Hoodik is an open source alternative to Sentry for error and performance monitoring. It collects application events and shows them in a unified dashboard with filtering and alerting to help developers fix issues faster.
features: Error Monitoring: Capture and track application errors with detailed stack traces.
Performance Tracking: Monitor application performance and identify slow operations.
Unified Dashboard: View all errors and performance data in a single interface.
Filtering System: Filter events by severity, environment, or custom criteria.
Alert Configuration: Set up notifications for critical errors or performance issues.
Sentry Compatible: Drop-in replacement for Sentry with similar SDK support.
Self-Hosted Privacy: Keep all error data and user information on your infrastructure.
Multi-Project Support: Monitor multiple applications from a single installation.
